title: Startup Fundraising
description: Learn the stages, metrics and expectations for each round from pre-seed to Series B.

title: Cap Tables & Dilution
description: Understand equity splits, option pools, and how dilution affects founder ownership over time.

title: Burn Rate & Runway
description: Calculate your cash burn and runway accurately to prevent cash flow surprises.

title: Customer Economics
description: Master CAC, LTV, payback periods and unit economics to prove your business model.

title: Term Sheets
description: Decode investor term sheets and understand the implications of key provisions.

title: Financial Modeling
description: Create realistic financial projections without overcomplicating the process.
